venue: Computer Science building of the University of Salerno, Via Ponte don Melillo, Fisciano (SA), Italy
intro: The seventh edition of the International Summer School on Software Engineering intends to provide a contribution to PhD students and academic and industrial researchers on latest findings in the field of Software Engineering.The invited lecturers are internationally recognised research leaders and will cover very relevant topics for the scientific community, including Human-Centered Software Engineering and Usability Engineering, Model Driven Software Engineering, Service Oriented Architectures, Adaptive and Self Managing Systems, Empirical Software Engineeering, Fault Prediction, Software Testing, Software Evolution, Program Comprehension, and Software Visualization. The program of the school will aim at creating discussion forums betweenlecturers and industrial and academic attendees.
